refnamediv.refpurpose: Sort an array by keys using a user-defined comparison function

refsect1.title: 설명
refsect1.para: This function will sort the keys of an array using a user-supplied comparison function. If the array you wish to sort needs to be sorted by some non-trivial criteria, you should use this function.

example.title: uksort example

refsect1.para: See also: usort, uasort, sort, asort, arsort, ksort, natsort and rsort.
